snippet.title: (Old) Primal Rage 2 Sauron Playthrough
snippet.description: Just a run through with Sauron seeing how well I can play with a Sega Saturn Controller by RetroBit especially since I always play this game with keyboard and reversed buttons with 4,5,6 on top and 1,2,3 on bottom.  I played this on the hardest difficulty this game has. Hope you enjoy.
